suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Session Navigation Component
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the refactored session navigation logic in TasksActive.svelte. Verify correct rendering, state management, and interaction behaviors. Tests should cover component initialization, state transitions, and edge cases in session handling.
suggestedTasks.reason: No existing tests for recently modified session navigation component

suggestedTasks.title: Document Session Navigation Refactoring Changes
suggestedTasks.description: Update project documentation to explain the recent changes in session navigation architecture. Describe the rationale for moving sessions to the views section, outline new component interactions, and provide guidance for future developers on the updated navigation flow.
suggestedTasks.reason: Lack of documentation for recent architectural changes
